b: ^I am big, it's the catering industry that got small.
^You’re lucky, you can choose a correct ingredient before starting!
^Choose ingredients and actions based on what’s been told to you… and be quick!
^DOGRON: Uh, you should have been eliminated, but you have the bonus that allows you to save yourself once! Luuuuucky you, yes yes !

s0: ^ The Great Council of Pugs discovered that you copy recipes from Nigella Lawson
s1: ^The Supreme Chihuahua has bitten your heel, repeatedly. You will die of rabies
s2: ^Bruiser Woods entered the Grand Council and made Piiiietro win

non_ce_lhai_fatta: ^. THE GOOOOOOOOOD DOG ends here for you.
eliminazione_concorrente: ^DOGRON: Congratulations, you won at the expense of:
finale_cinque: ^DOGRON: You bring some metaphysical cooking in here! What happened when you finished cooking?

s0: ^ Pazuzu himself rises from the Underworld to ask you what horror you have cooked
s2: ^A black hole opened in the control room, we’ll be back on air as soon as possible

finale_cinque: ^. I don't know why, but you are unbeatable!
finale_quattro: ^DOGRON: I'm still not sure if you can cook. So, how was it today?

s0: ^ Everything is fine in the kitchen. Outside, the universe has been erased
s1: ^ I'm being notified that the planet has stopped turning
s2: ^ Who am I? Where do I come from? What was on my plate? Someone please help me

finale_tre: ^DOGRON: I see your efforts today, and what about that which you cooked?

s0: ^ I can hear the pie letting out excruciating screams from the hoven.
s1: ^The thing that was on my plate is dancing with the cameraman.
s2: ^You cooked something that can throw me the ball!

finale_tre: ^ You won this challenge! See you tomorrow!

s0: ^ From the frying pan comes a smell of cyanide and sea water.
s1: ^Why is there melted plastic on my plate?
s2: ^After eating it, I coughed and dropped a lung.

finale_due: ^ But congratulations: see you in the next episode!

s0: ^ What's in the pan doesn't scream, doesn't move, and doesn't ask existential questions
s2: ^I know some students who might eat it, maybe

finale_uno: ^. Unexpectedly, you move on to the next episode!
finale: ^DOGRON: Uh, look at this beautiful devastation! Did you ever think you could win this show?

s: ^YOU: Of course, I'm the only person who actually cooked.
^YOU: You're not going to kill me, are you?
^YOU: Can I go home now?

g-0: ^DOGRON: Surprise: not a restaurant on Mercuuuuuuury, but, but, do you want to hear it?

s: ^YOU: The longer you take, the less I think I want to know.
^YOU: Yes, yes, yes!
^YOU: The important thing is to go home, please.

g-1: ^DOGRON: You will be the first person!

s: ^YOU: To do what?

g-2: ^DOGRON: To replace humans on our planet.
^DOGRON: Taking care of the Supreme Chihuahua, of the Pugs and of course of a sweet and very good (pat-pat!) labrador!

s: ^YOU: Which labrador are you talking about?

g-3: ^DOGRON: I don't like these jokes, no no.

s: ^YOU: Who’s a good dog? Who?

g-4: ^DOGRON: I am a good dog, a very gooooooood dog!!!

s: ^YOU: And where is your home located?

g-5: ^DOGRON: A very simple planet. There are fire hydrants, gardens, rivers, lots of tennis balls, kennels, pizza trees and beer fountains. I hope you will find it's to your liking.

s: ^YOU: Pizza trees?
^YOU: Beer fountains?
^YOU: Fire hydrants?
^YOU: Let's go!

c-11: ^DOGRON: Unfortunately, they grow up that way, even if we don't want to.

s: ^YOU: We're leaving, right now!!!

c-12: ^DOGRON: Yes! Do you like them too? Don't tell me you're a doggo!

s: ^YOU: No! But the Cult is allergic to water, they'll never catch me!

g-6: ^DOGRON: So, off we go! Our mission here is complete!
^_ Game Design: _ Marco Spelgatti, Mattia Belletti, Gabriele Perugini
^_ Narrative Design: _ Marco Spelgatti, Gabriele Perugini
^_ Ink Programming: _ Marco Spelgatti, Mattia Belletti
^_ Thank you for playing with us <3 _ (and go pat your _ DOGRON on our behalf)

s0: ^And nowwwwwwww, a warm welcome to all the contestants and those following us from home!
s1: ^Here we go again, contestants and spectators!
s2: ^Goooood evening to all the beautiful people on this planet and beyond!
s4: ^Last night my friends, last night together!

s0: ^Contestants, remember that every day youuuuu will lose one of your abilities. Human person here in front of me! Today you wil lose... drum rolls...
s1: ^What skill shall we take away from our huuuuuman person today?!?
s2: ^Fewer and fewer people, fewer and fewer active skills!
s4: ^Me big doggo, me not crying, no no, wooooof!

b: ^DOGRON: You will no longer be able to see the ingredients clearly.
^DOGRON: You will have no longer an ingredient of your choice to select at the start of the game.
^DOGRON: If you get the recipe wrong, you won't have any rescue plans.
^DOGRON: You will no longer be able to eliminate another contestant.
^DOGRON: No power to recall a person who left.
^DOGRON: I remind you, my dear person, that you will be able to talk to one more person.

eliminatrice_choice: ^DOGRON: You have a chance to get rid of one of these beautiful people, who do you want to get rid of?

s: ^YOU:BeBe.
^YOU:Piiiietro.
^YOU:Ugo and Mimi.
^YOU: That One
^YOU: Il Divo
^YOU: No person!

c-1: ^DOGRON: Piiiietro, my favourite number: you've been eliminated!
c-3: ^DOGRON: Oh. Oh. My friend, I hope you will forgive this contestant, but you must leave. I will see you again in the endless meadows!
c-5: ^DOGRON: I like this way of thinking!

resuscitatrice_choice: ^DOGRON: You want to bring a contestant back among us?

s: ^YOU:BeBe!
^YOU:Piiiietro!
^YOU: Ugo e Mimi!
^YOU: That One.
^YOU: Il Divo.
^YOU: MMM, I'm fine, thank you.

c-1: ^DOGRON: And here you go again: Piiiietro!
c-2: ^DOGRON: Mimi! How nice to have you here with us again!
c-3: ^DOGRON: Hello my friend, at long last!
c-5: ^DOGRON: Ah, uh, it seems cruuuuuel but that's the game, isn't it?

starting_test: ^DOGRON: Here we are little human person! I am super glad you are here with me and my new friends for this wonderful adventure!
^DOGRON: You will face five episodes of THE GOOOOOOOOOD DOG SHOW and I'm sure you will be the person who wins! I am sure about all of you, actually!
^DOGRON: And that makes the show difficult, perhaps.

^DOGRON: Anyway: to get to know each other better, I'd like to ask you a few questions, just to see how get by in the kitchen, and figure out what kind of contestant you're going to be. Shall we start?

s: ^YOU: Sure!
^YOU: Do I have any alternatives?
^YOU: Where am I? What is happening? Who are you?

c-1: ^DOGRON: Of course, but then you would miss all the fun!
c-2: ^DOGRON: No, wait, in this test I'm the one asking questions, friendly person!

domanda1: ^DOGRON: You're on an unknowwwwn planet, you've made a big mistake, and you don't know how to get back. What do you do?

s: ^YOU: Do I try and ask for help?
^YOU: Planet? No, seriously, why am I here?
^YOU: I sit in the corner and cry.

domanda2: ^DOGRON: All the people around youuuu talk about colors, but you haven't a clue what they are. How do you try to understand something you don't understand so you don't get caught?

s: ^YOU: I don't know, I stopped studying at the times table for 3s.
^YOU: But what rae all these lights? And why does the chair smell like wet dog?
^YOU: I copy the things other people do, hoping I don't screw up.

domanda3: ^DOGRON: Something with long whiskers, short hair and the ability to get into boxes has destroyed your favorite game. How do you react?

s: ^YOU: I destroy everything they hold dear.
^YOU: But what does this have to do with a cooking contest?
^YOU: Strange, all this reminds me of Kitty.

domanda4: ^DOGRON: Someone you love very very much told youuuu he would be right back, but it's already ten minutes and there’s still no sign of him. How do you deal with your grief?

s: ^YOU: Are we here to give you counseling, or for a competition?
^YOU: If you don't release me right now I'll call my lawyer!
^YOU: I'd say it's time to get some sleep, chill out a little bit, catch up on the list of video games in my list.

domanda5: ^DOGRON: What is your favorite food, but, like, your suuuuuper favorite thing in the world?

s: ^YOU: lamb skewers.
^YOU: Please get me out of this place, please, what did I ever do to you?!?
^YOU: The end of capitalism.

domanda6: ^DOGRON: They take you to the playground. There's sunshine, lots of friends, and your favorite collar.

s: ^YOU: But where is the question?
^YOU: This is perfection!
^YOU: Uh, what kind of collar? Is there a harness too?

domanda7: ^DOGRON: It's been days that your tummy hurts, your wwwwwwwhole tummy. They put you on a leash and pat on the trunk of the car. How do you react?

s: ^YOU: Please please free me I didn't do anything wrong, my succulent plant will miss me!
^YOU: I am a brave person, I will meet my destiny!
^YOU: No fucking way. I bite their hand and escape towards freedom!

domanda8: ^DOGRON: You buried someone, but you don't remember where you did it, and you're very sad, very. How do you react?

s: ^YOU: Oh. You're going to kill me, aren't you?
^YOU: No body, no crime. I'm sorry, Ermenegildo.
^YOU: I turn myself in to the police, voluntarily. Don't you think it’s the sensible thing to do? You're going to do it, right?

c-0: ^DOGRON: No no, what are you talking about, you're not a hot dog!

b: ^DOGRON: The quuuuestions are over! And thanks to our very accurate psychology system approved by the Grand Council of Pugs and the Supreme Chihuahua, I, Dogron The III, award you with…
^DOGRON: the ability to notice the ingredients right away!
^DOGRON: the ability to slow down time.
^DOGRON: the luck of being able to choose an ingredient at the beginning of a recipe.
^DOGRON: the right to chat with an extra person in the lounge.
^DOGRON: the, um, uh, thepossibilityofskippingyourdeathonce uh look how beautiful a labrador!
^DOGRON: The right to kick another person out of the program who is here to contestantatan. Cronestant. Contrestant. Someone that is here to play.
^DOGRON: The power to recall the dead once. Woah!

day_one_lounge: ^DOGRON: Contestants, today, in this first episode of THE GOOD DOG SHOW we will put you to the test by asking you tooooooo…
^DOGRON: Coooooking something that you would eat every day!
^DOGRON: You have a few minutes to talk to each other, before going to the kitchen. Translated into the show rules: a maximum of

^DOGRON: It's up to you to decide whether you want to share your secrets, trick the other contestants, or get a scratch behind your ear! And be carefuuuuuuul, because in THE GOOD DOG everything changes in the blink of an eye!

ugo_e_mimi_choice: ^UgoEMimi: Ugo, I don't think it’s appropriate.
^UgoEMimi: Mimi, it’s ME who decides when it's appropriate. And it just so happens that there’s a lot of money going around here and I need a publisher!
^UgoEMimi: Ugo, a stranger is watching us.

s: ^YOU: Um, hello!
^YOU: Are you also here against your will?
^YOU: Nice haircut, madam!

c-0: ^UgoEMimi: Hello, I am Ugo, and this is my wife Mimi. MY. Wife.
c-1: ^UgoEMimi: Mimi is shy but yes, we are here because we want to be.
c-2: ^UgoEMimi: My merit. I chose her hairdresser, as a good husband must!
g-0: ^UgoEMimi: And you, what are you doing here?
^UgoEMimi: Ugo, don't be rude, we are all tense because of this new situation!

s: ^YOU: I wonder about that too.
^YOU: I think it's a punishment from the Cult.
^YOU: I only remember my room, some chloroform…

g-1: ^UgoEMimi: Do you need help with the cooking, darling?
^UgoEMimi: Mimi! Why are you helping the competition? I need money for the publisher!
^UgoEMimi: But Ugo, I surely don’t want to tell this person that the secret for a perfect aspic is the best isinglass and to filter it gently.

s: ^YOU: Thank you ma'am, but the 80s have been over since a long time!
^YOU: I haven't had an aspic since the day Grandma was sacrificed to Adramelech for my initiation... so many memories!
^YOU: Madam, if you need help, blink twice.

c-8: ^YOU: Under this light I can't understand shit. Try again!

g-2: ^UgoEMimi: Mimi, let's go! I think I saw a chick with an iPod, maybe she's an audio designer!

bebe_choice: ^BeBe: I was so sure I put them here, holy cow!

s: ^YOU: Have you lost something?

g-0: ^BeBe: My sunglasses! I don't like to walk around without them.

s: ^YOU: You have them on, you know?
^YOU: But there is no sun here. Maybe not even on the whole planet.
^YOU: Uhm, yes, yes of course.

c-1: ^BeBe: Uh, how distracted I am! You know, having eight, er, seven daughters makes everything difficult.
c-2: ^BeBe: There is grass though, I can smell it!
c-3: ^BeBe: Are you quoting that new K-Pop group, the Blink of an eye?

g-1: ^BeBe: But how are you settling in, sweetheart? Do you have everything you need?

s: ^YOU: I don't know where I am, I just want to run away.
^YOU: Last time I cooked, my house exploded.
^YOU: I'm not supposed to be here. The Cult is looking for me.

c-4: ^BeBe: If I win, I promise to take you with me, I still have a spare bedroom!
c-5: ^BeBe: It happens to all everybody, sooner or later.

s: ^YOU: More importantly, what did you decide to cook for this first episode?

g-3: ^BeBe: Uh you know, even though I’m a working sheep, being a single mom of eight – darn it! – seven little lambs forces you to deal with money problems.
^BeBe: So I think I will make some bread and onion soup to slice.
^BeBe: Onion makes everything taste great, and it costs nothing.

s: ^YOU: Uh, now I understand your breath.
^YOU: I'm more of a snack person, you know?
^YOU: Thank you for the advice.

g-4: ^BeBe: But I haven't introduced myself! I'm Bebe. Now I'm going to get ready for the cooking phase, hope to see you soon!

s: ^YOU: Good luck.
^YOU: I will beat you.
^YOU: How do we get out of here!?!?

piiiietro_choice: ^Piiiietro: Bruiser Woods! Where did you go? Jesus, you took away my Gucci’s rosary too!
^Piiiietro: I told Snooki this was a bad idea, oh did I tell her, but no, she didn't listen! Bruiser!

s: ^YOU: Bruiser Woods?
^YOU: Gucci’s rosary?
^YOU: Snookie?

c-0: ^Piiiietro: Yes, like that Bruiser, and I can't find it!
c-1: ^Piiiietro: Yes, a gift from my grandmother Scianel to celebrate my 16th birthday.
c-2: ^Piiiietro: Sorry, I signed an NDA, that's all I can say.
g-0: ^Piiiietro: She'll be back, I hope. This planet looks tiny anyway, there won't be many other puppies.
^Piiiietro: Anyway, pleasure to meet you, I am Piiiietro, a math student. When I was fourteen years old, I solved the Collatz game.
^Piiiietro: At fifteen, the Navier-Stokes equations, but I haven't received the Fields medal yet because, after that Perel'man thing, they are afraid of messing up.
^Piiiietro: But you're not understanding a goddamn thing, are you?

s: ^YOU: Actually Perel'man used to copy from me in middle school.
^YOU: I'm still thinking about the Gucci’s rosary.
^YOU: No, but last week I got the change right at first try at the supermarket.

g-1: ^Piiiietro: Yeah, yeah, anyway, I’m pretty worried because my grandmother will kill me if I don't find the rosary, you know?
^Piiiietro: The whole family. They're all so religious, just think they have a holy card of Miuccia Prada with blinking eyes over the fireplace.
^Piiiietro: They forced me to study mathematics to demonstrate the existence of God.

s: ^YOU: And are you also a very good cook, then?

g-2: ^Piiiietro: Cook? What do you mean, cook?

s: ^YOU: Well, this is a cooking program, I think they kidnapped us, and so on…
^YOU: Where should we sing? Over that huge gas stove?
^YOU: I feel like I've been locked up tight, for a century of lonely nights, waiting for someone to release me…
^YOU: No thanks, I'd rather have been really kidnapped.

g-4: ^Piiiietro: But I can merely cook a pasta dish with stirred canned tuna, the fuck am I doing here?
^Piiiietro: Bruiser, Bruiser where are you? We've got to get out of here! See you later, or never!

quello_choice: ^Quello: Hello lunar splendor! Don't you think this place is magnificent?

s: ^YOU: Do you know how you got here?
^YOU: I think I saw a body earlier, just behind the camera. And it winked at me.
^YOU: Still better than the Church of the Cult, I think.

g-0: ^Quello: I feel a little bit of pressure, you know? All these professional people, and me being just a little pastry chef, as Il Divo always reminds me. Very very very small. Worthless, almost.

s: ^YOU: Il Divo?
^YOU: Do you let him tell you these things?
^YOU: The most complex thing I've ever cooked is a caprese, and I lost a finger because of that.

c-3: ^Quello: Yes, my boss, a strict but loving man in his own way. He forced me to come here, so if I win the money, it goes to his restaurant.
c-4: ^Quello: Every learner deserves the lesson of humility, don't you think?
c-5: ^Quello: Il Divo says it's important to always leave something of yourself in what you cook, you know?

g-1: ^Quello: Anyway pleasure, my name is That One. Sometimes it’s That One There, other times That Other One. People can be so creative.
^Quello: How will you try to impress Dogron?

s: ^YOU: By not hurting anyone.
^YOU: Escaping while all of you are cooking.
^YOU: Fried eggs?

g-2: ^Quello: Woah, you have very clear ideas! I wanted to go for meringues, but Il Divo last time called them too meringue-y, and that's no good. He understands what's right in a blink of an eye!
^Quello: I only know how to make desserts, so I was thinking of taking some butter and a few other things, patiently whip everything by hand and make some simple macaroons.

s: ^YOU: Simple. Sure. Simple.

g-3: ^Quello: Now I'm going to go clean the nails of Il Divo: the poor guy can’t do that alone. See you later, it was nice talking to you. Talking, in general.

il_divo_choice: ^ilDivo: No no, no Oprah for me, I certainly don't stoop to her level!

s: ^YOU: You're talking to me?

g-0: ^ilDivo: Yes, to you, there are no other people around. Ah no, yes, I was on the phone with the secretary. Again. Do you maybe have some saffron?

s: ^YOU: I'm going to ring my dealer in a second and tell you.
^YOU: Is that why you're all yellow?
^YOU: But rather, do you have any idea where we are?

c-1: ^ilDivo: Okay, check if he also has cocaine then.
c-2: ^ilDivo: Look, I'm red. Did Dogron teach you the colors?

g-1: ^ilDivo: No no, I wasn't talking to you. Holy moly, listen, I'll talk to you later. And make sure you work those three hours of unpaid overtime that we agreed on, okay?!?!
^ilDivo: And clean the kitchen, I don't care if the restaurant is closed.
^ilDivo: Here I am, you're obviously wondering what I'm doing here.

s: ^YOU: You're talking to me?

g-2: ^ilDivo: And who else, lazybones!!!? I guess you want an autograph, right?
^ilDivo: Or my secret to whip up my risotto alla milanese?
^ilDivo: Ah, but don't waste my time. Look for That One, and bring me a couple of ounces of caviar and coke for my winning snack.

day_two_lounge: ^DOGRON: Friendly people, we are already on the second day of THE GOOD DOG (very very goooood dog!) SHOW!!! Aren't you super mega happy and wagging your tails!!!? Oh, hoooowwwww I would hate to see you leave!
^DOGRON: But if we didn't eliminate someone, how could we find a perfect replacement for, for, for the larger kitchen of Uuuuuranus?
^DOGRON: And speaking of Uranus, today's theme is: a meal for when you meet with real friends!
^DOGRON: I'll give you a few minutes for the chit-chat and then we're off!

ugo_e_mimi_choice: ^UgoEMimi: Mimi, no, you're the one who doesn't understand! Kojima compared it to Skyrim! And Kojima is never wrong!
^UgoEMimi: Ugo, I don't want to contradict you, you know, but it was a dream!
^UgoEMimi: And you tell me that dreams lie, huh! Didn't you dream of cooking forever? Now look where we are!
^UgoEMimi: My dream was to open an electrician's tool store, not to cook vol-au-vents every Saturday for your boorish friends!
^UgoEMimi: Mimi, you're going too far now! And you know what happens when I get pissed off!

s: ^YOU: Mr. Ugo, so you are creating a video game?
^YOU: Mrs. Mimi, so you're into electricality, is that what it’s called?
^YOU: I don't know what’s up with you, but in the Cult if you don't mind your own business, you die in a bad way. Bye.

c-0: ^UgoEMimi: Oh, more than a video game, THE video game! It will be a stealth (but not too much) slasher shooter with 4X elements and a car race and resource management and multiplayer mode with microtransactions, NFT and lots of DLCs!
^UgoEMimi: But for now Ugo has only created the title and a cover with Paint.
c-1: ^UgoEMimi: A woman cannot be passionate about electricity, Mimi is only good at cleaning, cooking and ironing.
^UgoEMimi: And sure enough we live in a house where I did all the groundings.

bebe_choice: ^BeBe: Well, hello there! Who would have thought I would have survived the first day? LaLa didn't make it.

b: ^ BeBe: Anyway, I didn't get a chance to introduce myself yesterday, I'm BeBe, single mother of eight, er, seven little lambs.

s: ^YOU: LaLa?
^YOU: Why are you walking around with a cleaver?
^YOU: I feel sorry for the one who got out. But, sorry, who got out?

c-0: ^BeBe: A long story, a long long story.
c-2: ^BeBe: Do you think I remember the names of all of you, when I have to think about my lambs at home?
g-0: ^BeBe: But, given today's theme, let's talk about good things: do you have friends waiting for you? I only have my eight, uh, seven daughters, and I'm their best friend.
^BeBe: The best mom and friend there is. I would do anything for them!

s: ^YOU: Of course, if you are sure about it.…
^YOU: I have Kitty waiting for me at home, she is my life.
^YOU: There are a few people in the cult that I get along with, you know? But not too many.
^YOU: Do you have any secret recipe to count on today?

g-2: ^BeBe: If I told you, it wouldn't be secret, would it?
^BeBe: Just kidding, if the theme is "food for friendly people", of course I will share.
^BeBe: And you are a friend to me, aren't you?

s: ^YOU: Of course I do!
^YOU: (lie) Of course I do!
^YOU: (ironically) Of course I do!

g-3: ^BeBe: That reassures me. I don't like people who make fun of me.
^BeBe: Anyway, I was thinking, what is true friendship? And of course I thought about my eight, er, seven daughters. And what do they love to do when we're all together? Video games!
^BeBe: It amuses me a lot when they say in an affectionate way, "No mom, don't play with us tonight, please!" They are so sweet.
^BeBe: And so I was thinking of making baskets with fried grass blocks, and sheep eggs.

s: ^YOU: Sheep eggs?

g-4: ^BeBe: Sure. In friendship, sacrifice is important!!!
^BeBe: But now I have to go brood for a moment. See you later!

s: ^YOU: Um, see you later.
^YOU: I beg your pardon?
^YOU: Ah, great, see you later.
^YOU: Is that all you can cook?

g-0: ^Piiiietro: I saw that, yesterday you were watching what I was cooking. Everybody does that, copy other people's work, and then…!

s: ^YOU: It may surprise you, but I cook even worse than you do.
^YOU: And did you find your dog?
^YOU: And the rosary?

c-3: ^Piiiietro: Don’t overdo it, I saw what you brought up yesterday!
c-4: ^Piiiietro: No, and I found his Russian sable fur coat abandoned behind an armchair.
^Piiiietro: But he always does that when I forbid him to go on vacation somewhere.
c-5: ^Piiiietro: I think I saw it on Dogron, I'll have to investigate further.

g-1: ^Piiiietro: However, yesterday the producers told me that I can't leave, that I signed a contract, and that if the mistake is my agent's it doesn't change anything to them.

s: ^YOU: Agent?

g-2: ^Piiiietro: Math agent. We do challenges like rap, but with equations. It doesn't look like it but it's super tiring, last year two contestants died of dehydration just to finish, oh, I don't even remember what, I always win anyway.
^Piiiietro: But now I’ll go: I have to fix the diamonds on my teeth before the episode.

b: ^ Piiiietro: Ah, we didn't introduce ourselves yesterday: my name is Piiiietro.
^ Quello: Hello! I am That One There, or That One Here, sometimes. I was watching you cook yesterday and woah, you're doing great!

quello_choice: ^Quello: I'm kind of struggling today, you know?
^Quello: All my "real friends" are dead, you know?

s: ^YOU: You mean it like in that dinosaur joke?
^YOU: This is the moment when I have to say I'm sorry, right?
^YOU: I saw a very friendly sheep earlier. If you want to talk to her…

g-0: ^Quello: I won't bore you with my sad story, I promise. It’s just that I can't but think of recipes that have tears in them. Lots of them.

s: ^YOU: Don't they spoil the flavor?

g-1: ^Quello: It depends. Salty tastes are fine with bitter cocoa. I might make a cake.
^Quello: A cake that won’t be shared with anyone.
^Quello: Except for Il Divo, who would never eat it, however, because it would gross him out on trust. And he's right.
^Quello: Sorry, sadness is forbidden by my contract of employment. See you later, and good luck!

il_divo_choice: ^ilDivo: I get that, it's the Pope, but he can wait, I have to open a new office in Dubai before lunch, ok?!?

s: ^YOU: Why do I ever insist on talking to this guy?

g-0: ^ilDivo: Why hello gorgeous! Have we ever met before?

s: ^YOU: We, like, talked yesterday. Oprah, the cocaine, the saffron?
^YOU: I haven't yet had the luck, no.

g-1: ^ilDivo: They call me il Divo, but that's an understatement. I mean, the White House has a portrait of me.

^ilDivo: Wikipedia has my picture under the definition of "Cool", obviously not as in the temperature level, but why am I talking to you, you may not even have finished the high school, and, did I maybe already ask you, are you single?

s: ^YOU: Yes, and every time I meet a man I remember why.
^YOU: No, I have someone waiting for me at home, but I don't know how to get back!
^YOU: I think I have a crush on someone here in the studio.

g-2: ^ilDivo: Of course you will fall in love with me, of course. Bella Hadid decided not to mirror herself after she saw me.

^ilDivo: Because they tell you, "Hey, how great it must be to be part of a species with 23000 different sexual genders, it must be such a great deal," but then we have binary things too, and I end up falling in love, and…
^ilDivo: What am I saying? I'm hot stuff baby, you can't just grab me like that! And now I have to work, work, produce, fill in the void! Get out!

day_three_lounge: ^DOGRON: Good morning, everyone, and wwwwwelcome to the third episode of THE VERY VERY GOOD GOOD DOG SHOW!
^DOGRON: Don't you feel a little sad?
^ already have left us, and I don't feel like making youuuuu leave too, no!

^DOGRON: But the Supreme Chihuahua and the Grand Council of Pugs, in their wisdom they knooooooooow that it is important to find the perfect owner, I mean, the perfect little person for the restaurant on Saturn!
^DOGRON: And surely this fantastic person with fantastic hands that can pat my head so gooooooood, must know how to make a recipe for…
^DOGRON: ... when you feel sad because all the huuuuuumans are gone!
^DOGRON: As always you have a few minutes for chit-chat, and then it's time to start cooooooooking!

s: ^YOU: I know I'm going to regret saying this, but you seem very quiet today.

g-0: ^UgoEMimi: Ugo spoke with one of the publishers, for his video game.
^UgoEMimi: Junk sellers, they are. But did you know that the publishers are... pugs?!?
^UgoEMimi: And he was told that the project lacks a consistent narrative, and a connection between gameplay and graphical elements.

^UgoEMimi: They essentially told me that it makes no sense! That it's a game where meaningless things happen! But I've always been playing real video games! These are walking-simulator and visual-novel pugs!

s: ^YOU: What are you going to do now?

g-1: ^UgoEMimi: Oh, I will cook canapés while Ugo recovers from his pain.
^UgoEMimi: I do not suffer Mimi! Men do not suffer!
^UgoEMimi: What are then those tears, Ugo?

s: ^YOU: Aren't you scared about thing about missing humans?

g-2: ^UgoEMimi: Uh, I feel sorry for them, but we never really got along with humans. Not after the failure of the Virtual Boy.
^UgoEMimi: Speak for yourself, Ugo. I personally have always loved humans, I used to make a really good pizza when I could still cook them.

s: ^YOU: Oh, and I was afraid I was the only person who ate human flesh!
^YOU: There’s too much junk in my body for my meat to be tasty.
^YOU: I think it is time for me to go to Uranus.

bebe_choice: ^BeBe: Hey, there, I was distracted and didn't notice you coming.

s: ^YOU: Everything okay?
^YOU: In the cult they say, "Distraction is the gift of Belial."
^YOU: What's with the bandaged hoof?

c-0: ^BeBe: Oh yes of course, I'm so happy to be here!
c-2: ^BeBe: Uh, a mistake during the pedicure.
g-0: ^BeBe: On a different note! You've been here for three episodes now, and you haven’t spoken much about yourself. Would you like to confide something to me, something that will stay between us?

s: ^YOU: When I dream I see the coming of the Apocalypse, and all the Horsemen have the face of Joan Rivers.
^YOU: I am the second most important person in Rebecca Glasscock's fanclub.
^YOU: I don't know why I'm here, I'm afraid it's a punishment from the Cult for that mistake with Ermenegildo.

c-3: ^BeBe: I think it's a common thing after Iron Man 3.
c-5: ^BeBe: You seem like a very confused person, you know?

g-1: ^BeBe: But, don't you find today's theme a little strange? What did he mean with "humans are all gone"? And then again, what are humans?

s: ^YOU: Um, like, I am a human person?

g-2: ^BeBe: Uh, that's why that hairless face, and the fact that you doesn't ruminate! That's so funny. And are there sheep too where you come from?

s: ^YOU: Many, they are among the most common animals.

g-3: ^BeBe: What do you mean, animals? Of course, it must be a civilized place, with so many sheep, very good!

s: ^YOU: We raise them to eat them, make wool, make milk.
^YOU: Yes, that's right, very civilized, um.
^YOU: Well, they make great sacrificial animals for the Cult!

c-10: ^BeBe: What do you mean? No, wait, I don't want to know. I don't want to.

g-4: ^BeBe: Today I want to amaze DOGRON: disappearance involves suffering, and suffering is overcome through pain. Therefore, I will cook something by milking myself and then carding my own wool.
^BeBe: That's why I say my goodbye to you now, and wish you the best.

piiiietro_choice: ^Piiiietro: Yet I was sure it was a D minor.

s: ^YOU: Excuse me?
^YOU: You were down a semitone.
^YOU: Demeanor of whom?

g-0: ^Piiiietro: But do you always get in other people's rooms like that? What a scumbag!

s: ^YOU: Actually this is the lounge, and it’s shared. But, do you have your own room?

g-1: ^Piiiietro: Sure, otherwise where would I place the UV bed and the speaker system?

s: ^YOU: Please please give me something that looks like sunshine for an hour!
^YOU: Speaker system? So it was you who was singing earlier?

c-4: ^Piiiietro: What if I then get a sunburn infection!!!?
c-6: ^Piiiietro: And now we clearly see who has an agent and who does not, sorry for that!

g-2: ^Piiiietro: Anyway: maybe they'll let us have karaoke. Short, tonight, after the rehearsal. It seems that my pasta with canned tuna and even badly drained is a hit. I'll try it again tonight!

s: ^YOU: But doesn’t the theme bother you, by any chance?
^YOU: I mean, do you see other human people?

c-8: ^Piiiietro: Hey sweetheart, speak for yourself! I am a mathematical genius, an abstract entity, the very definition of the golden section. And I wear leopard print. Like hell I'm human!
^Piiiietro: And now get out of my room, I want to create some drama between BeBe and Dogron.

s: ^YOU: Is everything alright?
^YOU: You look angry.

s: ^YOU: What do you mean?

g-1: ^Quello: Il Divo always says that work solves every problem and every fear, though. So I'm going to start cooking. I was thinking that disappearance is a bitter thing, so I might make a braid that is a storytelling of other vacuum cleaners like me.

s: ^YOU: Or when your father adds a new space-time dimension to your planet because he had a fight with your other father.

g-2: ^Quello: That's right. You really understand me. I'm going to clean up Il Divo’s ingredients and then I will start my recipe. Thank you for the understanding!

s: ^YOU: That one who?
^YOU: Is he cleaning something of yours?
^YOU: You know that I don't work for you, right?

s: ^YOU: What do you mean by “two genders”?
^YOU: What do you mean by “on your own”?
^YOU: What do you mean by… THEY PAY YOU?!?!

g-1: ^ilDivo: I’m sure you were wondering about this the whole time and, yes, being rich and famous is damn hard. Think, like, how do I know if a person loves me?

s: ^YOU: But are you here for the cooking contest, or to find love?

g-2: ^ilDivo: Me? A cooking contest? What do you think I am?!?
^ilDivo: Xi Jinping paid 7,759,312,650.00 Yuan for a selfie with me!
^ilDivo: I learned to receive interviews before I even walked!
^ilDivo: A cooking contest, tsk. That One is cooking for the both of us, what were you thinking?

s: ^YOU: Ooooook, it's time for me to go away.

day_four_lounge: ^DOGRON: Tail, come here! Tail, tail! Stop! Bad tail, bad tail!
^DOGRON: Welcome to the fooooooourth and penultimate episode of THE VERY GOOD DOGGO GOOD DOGGO GOOD DOGGO! AND SHOW! Here is your favorite host, isn’t it? I am youuuuur favorite host, right?
^DOGRON: Who is the best host in the world? Who is he?
^DOGRON: Today's theme concerns us all. The theme that comes to your mind when your favorite mug breaks, or the kibble is new and tastes unexpected, or the mailman has a clean uniform.

^DOGRON: Or when they get a puppy and they tell youuuu that everything will stay the same but it's not true, that puppy starts walking, goes to stuuudy and you got attached to them and they forget about you.
^DOGRON: Today's theme is change, something to accept change.
^DOGRON: Another great idea from Supreme Chihuahua and the Pug Council.
^DOGRON: You can chat with each other for a little while, and then we start cooking.

s: ^YOU: Mrs. Mimi, I notice something different!

s: ^YOU: He had his why with that tuft.

g-2: ^UgoEMimi: But I'm going now, sweetheart, I have an appointment with a certain android. See you later!

s: ^YOU: Are you all right, BeBe?

g-0: ^BeBe: Yes yes yes, I'm just in a hurry. Change, it's important to embrace change. Change, for my eight, no, seven daughters. Seven.

s: ^YOU: How come you always quote your daughters?

s: ^YOU: Should I worry?

g-2: ^BeBe: No, you shouldn’t. But today I will bring a very special recipe, you know? Change requires risk, and for that I'm going to use hemlock. A little bit of poison, betting on how fatal it can be. And the killer's collar.

s: ^YOU: Um, I think I left the cat in the oven.

g-3: ^BeBe: Axe-eptance. You have to axe-ept it all. See you later, bye.

s: ^YOU: Who?

g-0: ^Piiiietro: Bruiser. He left me a letter, telling me that he found a Supreme Chihuahua, and that he will live with her. That he sent a service cat and retrieve his spotted bowls and his satin and diamond kennel, and asks not to look for him.
^Piiiietro: He thanks me for these years together, but he thinks it's time for him to be with someone who doesn't hide himself from the others. Who doesn't pretend to be infinite, he says.

s: ^YOU: What does he mean?
^YOU: I'm sorry… I guess?
^YOU: Bruiser can write?!

g-1: ^Piiiietro: He's right, you know? You, do you show yourself as you are to the world?

s: ^YOU: I mean, if people saw the gifts I inherited from my ancient father, they would be made blind by madness.
^YOU: In the Cult I learned to hide who I am so that I could get everything.
^YOU: I tried it once. Lots of alcohol, police, a few days in jail for indecent exposure. Poor sheep.

g-2: ^Piiiietro: Gee, you've had an interesting life!
^Piiiietro: Mine instead... Bruiser is probably right, you know? I don't really live. I have to, I have to say things out loud. But it's so fucking scary for me to do that.

s: ^YOU: We've been kidnapped, we're on a planet the size of an Ikea store, we won't know what will become of us tomorrow. If you don't speak today, when?
^YOU: I have someplace to be…
^YOU: BeBe sounds to me like a good listener, you know?

c-9: ^Piiiietro: When she needs to say my name she gets all mixed up, though.

g-3: ^Piiiietro: I too will welcome change tonight, you know? Like Bruiser. No more pasta with canned tuna. I'll make pasta with natural canned tuna! And I will present it by singing.
^Piiiietro: Uh, I said it. I have to run now, see you later!

quello_choice: ^Quello: Let me give you a hug!

s: ^YOU: You look great, That One!
^YOU: Um, first get the dust off.

^Quello: Like forgiving my father. He didn't invent roomba against me, against us.
^Quello: It was people, lazy people, who got rid of us vacuum cleaners in favor of those, those who are maybe my brothers, don't you think?

s: ^YOU: I just feel a great confusion in my head now.

g-2: ^Quello: I couldn't forgive my father, so I sought another one. I put my energies and my faith in il Divo. Another arrogant man.

^Quello: But I am a good person by myself, don't you think? Even though we were all thrown into dumpsters. Even if my father created something to replace us all. Even if il Divo will never give me his approval.
^Quello: I am the one who has to approve MYSELF, and that's it.

s: ^YOU: That's deep, bro!

g-3: ^Quello: Now I'm going to go to il Divo, and tell him I'm quitting. Also, I'm going to win this program!

il_divo_choice: ^ilDivo: Uh, my favorite contestant! How are you doing?

g-0: ^ilDivo: You certainly have a fabulous life, don't you?
^ilDivo: But never as much as mine!

s: ^YOU: What a surprise.

s: ^YOU: Bruiser?
^YOU: Ermenegildo?
^YOU: The Supreme Chihuahua?

g-2: ^ilDivo: Me, myself and I. There is only one great love in this life, and it can only be me. Just me!

s: ^YOU: I'm sorry but I have to have my ears pulled out before continuing this show.
^YOU: I can't, I have to drop a spotlight on my head and hope to die.

g-1: ^UgoEMimi: It's strange that this experience is ending, you know? So many things have changed!

s: ^YOU: What have you done to your hair?

g-2: ^BeBe: However it goes, I am happy about this meeting, this journey with you. Today I will bring something unexpected, to DOGRON. Something that will leave him trembling, terrified.

s: ^YOU: Like what?

s: ^YOU: Do you want to kill DOGRON?
^YOU: Why didn't you do it earlier?
^YOU: LaLa?

^BeBe: The time for forgiveness is over. Now it’s time for BeBerminator!
^BeBe: See you on the other side!
